categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: The Battle of Kligson's Moon was fought during the Osarian-Rhommamool conflict which occurred with the Yuuzhan Vong War (25–29 ABY).

Kligson's Moon, also known as Droid World, was a mobile space station in the Unknown Regions inhabited by the cyborg Kligson and the many droids he had rescued. Due to its high level of technology, it was targeted by the technophobic Red Knights of Life, an allied group of the Yuuzhan Vong invaders who hated any form of mechanical technology.
However, the Red Knights were repelled by the Iron Knights.
